definition: without borders (used for organizations such as Médecins sans Frontières)
Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF charity)/Doctors Without Borders

sentences.english: DBW helps saving lives and we thought that was pretty cool.
sentences.chinese: 無國界醫生組織協助拯救生命，我們覺得這很棒。

sentences.english: Médecins sans Frontières has also been assisting control efforts in Edo State.
sentences.chinese: 無國界醫生組織也一直在埃多州協助控制工作。

sentences.english: Due to the fictitious character of internet, the actions of crime on the internet usually appeared transnational character.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網的虛擬無國界性使得網絡犯罪呈現跨國性特點。

sentences.english: people got like, international tradition, you know.
sentences.chinese: 人們都很喜歡這種無國界的派對傳統。

sentences.english: Fusion food is a melting pot of cuisines from many cultures.
sentences.chinese: 無國界料理是許多文化的料理的融合體。

sentences.english: Science is a truly global undertaking and its language is English.
sentences.chinese: 科學無國界，它的語言是英語。

sentences.english: Nonstate actors can have a dramatic influence on the world around them.
sentences.chinese: 無國界人士對他們周圍的世界有着巨大的影響。
見時代視頻資料“蜜蜂無國界。”

sentences.english: N yes, music has no boundary. Just like love, did you contact your ex-girlfriend?
sentences.chinese: 音樂無國界，就像愛情一樣，你聯繫過你的前女友麼？

definition: to agree without prior consultation/to happen to hold the same view
to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
to love Hong Kong (usually implying that one also supports the PRC government)
When you enter a village, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
male and female/both types (acid and alkaline, positive and negative etc)/(chemistry) amphoteric
brimming with enthusiasm (idiom); full of warmth
to proclaim/to make public or well known
to develop/to make full use of
